data.apiNameCn: 国际运价规则查询（新版）
data.introduce: 新国际退改签规则格式化查询服务是国际shopping服务的后继服务，为客户提供退改签规则查询。
data.business: 新国际退改签规则格式化查询服务是国际shopping服务的后继服务，所需的查询条件来源于国际shopping查询服务返回的结果或者国际运价计算Pricing服务返回的结果。
data.functions:
1.支持CAT16规则结构化展示；
   2.支持历史数据查询；
   3.支持婴儿儿童折扣计算。
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"seller","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票方","children":[{"name":"pos","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"销售地代码，

市三字码","children":[]},{"name":"travelAgencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"当seller是代理人时，此处填写代理人的PCC/office号：PEK099","children":[]},{"name":"channel","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"id","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"departmentCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"当 seller 是航空公司营业部时，此处填写 C + 航空公司两字码，CCA","children":[]},{"name":"officeIdOwnedByCarrier","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"当 seller 是航空公司时，此处填写航空公司两字码，CZ","children":[]},{"name":"iataNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"seller 的 iata 号，13301116，必输项","children":[]},{"name":"accountCodes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"大客户编码，可以填写多个","children":[{"name":"carrier","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航空公司两字码，目前必须填写 YY","children":[]},{"name":"code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Account Code,ACCOUNT","children":[]}]},{"name":"platingCarrier","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出票航空公司两字码，MU","children":[]}]},{"name":"ffepCmd","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"用来区分要调用哪个接口","children":[{"name":"targetLanguage","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"期望返回结果，填“raw”返回“cat16结构化数据”；填“text”返回“原文”；填“cn-Trans”返回“简要中文翻译”；填“cat31”额外返回”cat31改期的内容”；填“cat33”额外返回”cat33退票的内容”；“raw”为必填项，可多选。","children":[{"name":"carrier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"origin","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"name","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价始发地代码","children":[]},{"name":"type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"进一步指定运价
